title: Masters abroad which would be the best choice
content:
which would be a better pick considering my goal is to pursue masters abroad, all factors like GPA and extra credits included. I'm getting all 3 through kcet.

[View Poll](https://www.reddit.com/poll/1epj4i6)

comments.body: I'm not in PES (this sub keeps showing up on my feed) but I know it's harder to get a good cgpa there compared to BMS or MSRIT so I'd say go with those. For MS abroad your college doesn't matter at all unless it's an IIT, your GPA matters a lot though. For placements PES is the best but otherwise I don't see why you should simply struggle there.
